name: Crosswell Tier 0
description:
Crosswell is the name of a project I have at least 3 iterations of at this point, this being the third, and the second to get a version out to others.

The name "Tier 0" refers to the fact that this game is designed to be in Tiers with the player advancing through the story as they progress in tiers.  Think of it as Acts in a story, but each Tier is designed to be a self-contained story with a beginning middle and end.

Tier 0  is the initial proof of concept I am using to gauge interest and establish what works and doesn't.  It could be seen as a Demo and tutorial for what the rest of the game should be.

As you can probably guess I would very much like some constructive criticism with regards to what you feel works in the game and what does not.  Preferably posted on this page.

Known Issues:

-Occasionally Items gained from chests will not be announced.  The item is still added to inventory.

Finally if I have captured your interest and you would like to collaborate on this project please contact me on Discord: Alevel3mage#7182



Thanks to:

Yanfly, for the excessive amount of plugins of his I use.

DreamX, for the item suffix prefix plugin

SumRdmDud, for his plugins.

Burkess, for some of the characters that I still have left over from the last iteration of this project.
